Noushost Netherlands 1Gbps Linux VPS is Open Source Virtualization Technology which provides highest features to the VPS users. Noushost provides SolusVM Control Panel which controls VPS with many advanced features and we also provide VPS in Netherlands Largest TIER III Eco-Friendly Datacenter and 20+ Linux Operating Systems are available for installation on single click.

Our Netherlands VPS are powered by the widely used software OpenVZ hypervisor with 1Gbps network line and Controlled by SolusVM Panel. OpenVZ virtualization provides better performance, scalability, density, dynamic resource management, and ease of administration than the alternatives. Take advantage of our servers, fully redundant fiber network and our team of specialists in Linux.

****Instant Setup Anytime Easy Upgrade OpenVZ Virtualization SolusVM Control Panel 100Mbps Network Line 99.89% Uptime Guarantee****
